translation1: "Today, let's take a look at some \"strange\" hot searches. What is normal public opinion? Randomly selecting three hot searches: February 2nd Dragon Lifting its Head, Pretty Friends Rising in Price, and the Incident of Goods Being Carried Away, public opinion spreads and forms a peak, and then the index drops (following a smooth curve) and eventually dissipates. If secondary public opinion is generated, small peaks may reappear.They look completely different from the \"Internet Public Opinion Evolution Model\" previously displayed on the website of the Cyberspace Administration of China. What is abnormal public opinion? By randomly selecting six hot searches from the same event, they present a \"lonely peak\", \"sawtooth\", and \"cliff\" pattern.The following text has been translated from Chinese to English:  【Peak shape】 refers to human-induced heating, which quickly rises to the top of the hot search list and attracts widespread attention; 【Serrated shape】 refers to periodic heating, which ensures that the topic remains at the top of the hot search list; 【Cliff shape】 refers to collective withdrawal, where a hot search topic has fulfilled its \"function\" and moves on to a new task and a new battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of one event's popularity is exactly the trough of another event's popularity, with only a few seconds between them. This must be a coordinated water army receiving a new task and launching a new offensive. The professionalization of black PR is evident: dozens of hot topics are simultaneously on the list, which ones attract attention, which ones are responsible for popularization, which ones provoke and lead, which ones shift attention, which ones affect cognition, which ones mislead judgment, which ones incite emotions, and which ones influence decision-making. Black PR accounts are divided into batches and fine-tPropagation is a science, discarding all subjective factors such as stance and emotions, and only relying on objective data, even black PR will be powerless. Wherever one goes, they will leave a trace, such traces, let's dig them out together. Data source: Time Machine Hot Search."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "4", "Explanation": "The text is mostly fluent and coherent. It presents a clear and logical argument about internet public opinion, 'hot searches', and Black PR. However, there are a few instances of unnatural wording (e.g., 'a coordinated water army', 'fine-tPropagation') and missing punctuation, which slightly affect the overall fluency but do not impede understanding. The terms 'Peak shape', 'Serrated shape', and 'Cliff shape' are nicely defined. Overall, despite minor issues, the text reads well and it's mostly fluent in its linguistic representation." } }

translation1: "Taking a foot bath and feeling a tingling sensation in your feet, is it due to electric leakage? Choosing a suitable foot bath can have a good therapeutic effect on foot care. Today, the editor of JD.com will answer this question and hope to help friends. With the increase in people's awareness of health, foot baths are becoming more and more popular, and a variety of products with different specifications have emerged in the market, ranging from over a hundred to thousands of yuan. This has given consumers a lot of space for choice.In related data tables, compared with traditional household appliances, sales of health-related household appliances such as bathtubs are booming, but bathtubs do not have a dedicated industry standard, so there is a certain safety risk. \"It's really dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!\" Mr. Li told reporters. Recently, he bought a bathtub as a birthday gift for his father, but his father felt numbness in his feet when soaking in the bathtub.Mr. Li initially thought it was the vibration function of the foot bath that caused it, but he didn't expect that even after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt numbness in his feet. Mr. Li tried it with a pen, and the pen surprisingly lit up. Mr. Li discovered that there was electricity in the water of the foot bath. Later, he contacted the merchant, and the merchant's attitude was not bad, although the foot bath was returned. Mr. Li still felt unsatisfied.Because he found that this popular bathtub for a long time has no clear and detailed industry regulations on the highest temperature setting, applicable population, and material safety, etc. However, in general, bathtubs are not prone to electrical problems, but it is not ruled out that some products may not have been strictly controlled during manufacturing. Therefore, when purchasing, it is recommended to choose a modular bathtub.\"Water and electricity are separated, with no safety hazards. You can easily test it with a pen.\""

This year, all districts in Beijing have compressed the admission ratio for gifted students, making the competition even more intense.Taking the Dongcheng District as an example, the proportion of students with special talents in sports, arts, and science entering junior high school this year in the district does not exceed 5% of the total planned enrollment of the district. Students with special talents in sports, arts, and science who have applied online are eligible to participate in the selection examination for special talent students. To facilitate students' participation in the examination, Dongcheng District continues the examination arrangement from last year, setting 1-2 examination sites in each school district, with a total of 13 examination sites.The examination points are divided into examination venues according to the examination districts, and the time slots are divided by hours. translation1: "The Yangtze River mainstream has achieved full coverage of water-based green comprehensive service areas - Xinhua Net Xinhua News Agency Wuhan December 11th (Reporter Wang Xian) Chongqing Municipality Wushan Water-based Green Comprehensive Service Area was officially put into operation on the 10th, marking the second water-based green comprehensive service area in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River to officially operate after the Luzhou Water-based Green Comprehensive Service Area in Sichuan Province was put into operation on the 8th. With this, water-based green comprehensive service areas have been covered in the upper, middle, and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.The vice director of the Changjiang Navigation Management Bureau of the Ministry of Transport, Qiu Kehua, introduced that before this, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu had already built and put into operation 10 waterway green comprehensive service areas in the middle and lower reaches of the Changjiang River, which have been widely recognized by sailors and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Changjiang navigation. The full coverage of the waterway green comprehensive service area is another milestone event in the construction of Changjiang green navigation, which significantly improves the reception of ship pollutants and the service capacity of navigation. It is introduced that the waterway green comprehensive service area is an important facility for providing comprehensive production and living services for sailors and ships, helping sailors to solve the problem of \"urgent worries\".This time, two water-based green comprehensive service areas have been built and put into operation on the upper reaches of the Yangtze River, integrating life services, production services, and government services, with green environmental protection as the theme and ship repair and emergency rescue services as the highlight. It realizes the \"one-stop docking, multiple services\" for ships in the port area, which will make the sailors who have been navigating on the Yangtze River for many years work more efficiently and live more conveniently."

translation1: "What is the method of drinking red label whisky? Everyone's hobbies are different, some like collecting, some like food, of course, there are also those who like to drink wine. Red label whisky is currently one of the best-selling Scottish whiskies in various countries, and it has also won international wine awards. Each bottle of red label whisky has a unique taste, but if you don't know how to savor it, won't you waste its aroma and flavor?So, how do you drink Red Letter Whiskey? Let me introduce it to you simply. The method of drinking Red Letter Whiskey is as follows:The Glenfiddich 15-year-old single malt Scotch whisky is made from a blend of about 35 different Scotch whiskies. It has a rich and fragrant aroma with traditional characteristics of Scotch whisky, and a fragrant aroma with a hint of sweetness and smokiness. On the palate, it is rich and refreshing with a hint of grassiness. This whisky can be enjoyed on its own over ice or mixed with your favorite drink.Red wine enters the domestic market, in order to adapt to the taste of the people, red wine + Coca-Cola or Sprite or other fizzy drinks have become a timeless fashion. These sweet drinks can not only neutralize the sour taste, but also visually bring pleasure to people, and play a role in diluting the taste of alcohol and changing the mouthfeel when added to the drink. The most authentic and traditional way to drink red wine is with slices of lemon and sugar (cane sugar is also acceptable).The authentic red wine has a slightly sour taste, adding sugar can neutralize the sourness, and lemon can bring a refreshing fragrance to the wine. Of course, the sweet and sour taste can be adjusted according to personal taste preferences. The above three are the best ways to drink red wine, and everyone can try them as a reference. I hope my introduction can help everyone."

Lastly, the whole passage seems to be dealing with whisky initially then switches abruptly to red wine, further confusing the reader. " } }

translation1: "The curator of the China Sand Museum collaborated with the Saudi Arabian Ministry of Culture to hold the first Saudi Arabian Contemporary Art Biennale - China News Network China News Service Riyadh, December 12 (Reporters: Wang Hai Zhou, Hu Guan) The first Saudi Arabian Contemporary Art Biennale - Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennale was officially opened to the public on the 11th in the Diriyah JAX Art District located in the northwest of the Saudi capital Riyadh, with a total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia and China participating. This biennale is co-curated by the Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennale Foundation in Saudi Arabia and the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in China, with the director of the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art, Yan Fuyu, serving as the artistic director.According to the curatorial team's introduction, the theme of this year's biennial exhibition is \"Feeling for Stones to Cross the River\", which metaphorically represents the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transformation period and reflects the current state of cultural development in Saudi Arabia. The biennial exhibition covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters and spans six interconnected buildings, presenting six units: \"Feeling for Stones to Cross the River\", \"Experiment as Inheritance\", \"Borderline Thinking\", \"Towards the Public\", \"Beautiful New World\", and \"On the Spirit of Art\". Among them, the works of 27 Saudi artists account for more than 40% of the total number of works, covering various forms such as painting, installation art, and performance art. The works of 12 Chinese artists are also highly regarded, some of whom use innovative ways to create works using recycled materials, such as Xue Huan's \"Behind the Story Series: The Endless Stream of Qiyun Mountain\" (2014), which reconstructs a classic landscape painting using wasteThe chief executive of the Diriyah Biennale Foundation, Bakri, stated that he hopes this year's biennale can establish international dialogue and allow global audiences to understand Saudi Arabia's vibrant cultural industry and creative communities, enhancing interaction and communication. Tan Feiyu said, \"The goal of the biennale is dual. On the one hand, it aims to allow Saudi contemporary art to participate in the global conversation, and on the other hand, it aims to immerse Saudi audiences in the world of contemporary art.\" It is understood that a series of lectures will be held during the opening period of the biennale, where artists, curators, and opinion leaders in the art and creative industries will discuss topics such as cross-cultural exchange and contemporary art development."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "5", "Explanation": "The text is highly fluent, with no grammatical errors, unnatural wording, or stiff syntax. translation1: "In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a factory in Yushan Town, Yongjia County, Zhejiang through a real estate agent. After several on-site visits, Mr. Lu decided to purchase the factory. In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with the owner's family member, Lin, on the details of purchasing the factory and transferred 200,000 yuan to the seller's bank account as a deposit. Lin signed on the \"Factory Purchase and Sale Deposit Receipt\" as the recipient, stating that \"if the buyer does not want to buy this factory, the deposit will be returned to the seller. If the seller does not want to sell this factory, the deposit will be doubled returned to the seller. Both parties agree to sign the factory purchase and sale contract within a week.\"However, due to disagreements on key contract terms such as the scope of the factory for sale and payment methods, the property sale contract has not been signed for a long time. Considering that both parties have failed to reach an agreement on the contract content, a few days later, Mr. Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 yuan to Mr. Lu. The house that was carefully selected, the deposit was paid, and the down payment was also ready, just waiting to sign the contract, but the seller did not sell, which made Mr. Lu feel helpless and angry.For this reason, Mr. Lu filed a lawsuit against Mr. Lin at the Yongjia City People's Court. After the court conducted a trial, it determined that both parties ultimately failed to sign a formal contract, and it was not appropriate to solely blame the defendant. "Da Mei 360 Integrated Home Decoration Address: Huan Cheng Nan Lu 156 Hao Xing Fu Yuan 12 Floor  It all started with a friend's introduction because of trust. At first, my budget was 70,000 yuan for basic renovation.As soon as I arrived at the store, a series of scams began. This was my first time there, and I only showed them my house plan. They didn't even go to the site to measure the house, yet they could give me a quote and say that my 135 square meter house could be done for 70,000 yuan. They roughly looked at their materials, but they didn't even know what brand of materials they were. Their second scam was that once you came to the store, they would drag you into paying the deposit (and once you paid, you would never be able to get it back unless you had enough experience and could argue with them).When I was hesitating whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell you that if you pay the deposit today, they can give you how much discount. This is a big trap, and I am a living example of being cheated. When I was impulsive, I paid more than 10,000 yuan deposit. The quotation he gave me had many problems, 70,000 yuan did not include water and electricity renovation, did not include any doors and cabinets, and the bathroom was not included. These three are the basic costs.Excluding their service charges, which are higher than those of other companies, I have lost trust in this company. They didn't explain anything to me before I signed the contract. When I went to ask for a refund, they seemed very experienced, with a dedicated team to deal with me.Regardless of how it happens, biting to death is always the customer's problem, and they are completely blameless. There are all sorts of shifting of responsibility, as well as many details, and I don't want to go into them all; it's all tears. In short, don't choose them, because my friend found that the house they decorated was of poor quality, and they charged all sorts of fees in the end. These people are like the head of a scam, pretending to be big and American now, but seem to have gone bankrupt and changed to something else.So don't choose such unreliable decoration companies. In the future, when you choose, remember to search on Baidu and check these consultations because decoration is not cheap. "In the next three years, Jiangxi will train 10,000 music, art, and physical education teachers for rural primary schools. According to a report from the Jiangxi Education Department, in order to strengthen the shortage of teachers in these subjects and achieve balanced development in rural compulsory education, the province has planned to provide training for one music, art, and physical education teacher each for every rural primary school (township and below) starting from 2016. The training is open to primary school teachers in Jiangxi who are under the age of 45 and have a basic knowledge or talent in music, art, or physical education and can also teach other subjects.Through training, we aim to equip them with basic knowledge and teaching skills in the field of aesthetics education, update their teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve their ability to teach the subject, design activities, and cultivate campus culture, as well as their ability for self-development. By building a team of teachers who are proficient in multiple areas, we hope to alleviate the problem of a shortage of aesthetics teachers in rural areas. To ensure the quality and effectiveness of the training, Jiangxi plans to provide training for 100 counties (cities, districts) in the province, with one trainee each for music, art, and physical education in each county, for a total of 300 trainees. translation1: "The State Council's joint defense and joint control mechanism has issued a notice requiring the strengthening of epidemic prevention and control at ports of entry. It stipulates that those who have recently left land border ports of entry (excluding those connected to Hong Kong and Macau) must provide proof of a negative nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and those entering land border ports of entry must undergo at least one nucleic acid test after arrival. The notice states that this requirement will be in effect from the date of announcement of the port of entry cities by each province, district, and municipality until March 15, 2022.In addition, the notice proposes that cities with ports that meet certain conditions can study the establishment of epidemic prevention and control buffer zones within their jurisdiction. A relevant person in charge of the National Health Commission introduced that for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main economic support, and frequent exchanges occur between the two sides of the border. By implementing differentiated management policies, a single line of epidemic prevention and control can become two lines, which is expected to achieve pre-border control, compress the risk of epidemic overflow, and achieve the maximum effect of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and lowest social cost.Recently, there have been several local outbreaks of COVID-19 in our country, all of which were imported through ports of entry in cities. The aforementioned notice pointed out that this exposed some problems, such as delayed epidemic monitoring and early warning in some areas, inadequate implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk personnel, inadequate implementation of regular nucleic acid testing, inadequate disinfection of the entire cold chain, inadequate management of quarantine sites, and inadequate scientific and precise handling of epidemic emergencies. The notice requires efforts to be made in nine areas, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, and implementing border control measures, to fill the gaps in the epidemic prevention and control work in port cities, without any relaxation, and to do the work of epidemic prevention and control in a scientific and precise manner, and to tighten the external defense line to prevent the importation of the epidemic.The notice emphasizes that cities at ports of entry should synchronize the work of epidemic prevention and control with the protection of people's livelihoods, publish and publicize the hotline for people's livelihood protection, and regularly investigate and address potential risks in areas such as the supply and price of basic necessities of life. According to the notice, the aforementioned port cities include those with land, water, and air ports located in counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (prefectures, cities, leagues), and directly-administered municipalities, with the specific scope determined by each province (autonomous region, municipality directly under the central government) based on the needs of epidemic prevention and control and announced in a timely manner."

translation1: "Asian American groups file complaint against Yale and 2 other Ivy League schools for discrimination in admissions - Xinhua Net Xinhua News Agency Washington, May 23 (Reporter Xue Jianmei) 130 Asian American organizations in the United States submitted a joint complaint to the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on the 23rd, protesting against discrimination against Asian American applicants by three Ivy League schools - Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College - during the admissions process. The Asian American Education Alliance, which initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on the same day.The chairman of the organization, Zhao Yukong, said at the press conference that the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission requirements of American top schools has increased many times in the past 10 years, but the proportion of Asians in these three top schools has basically remained at the same level. Many studies have shown that these universities discriminate against Asian applicants in the so-called \"holistic review\" admission process, systematically and continuously. Zhao Yukong introduced that a study by Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that in these three schools, the admission rate of Asians relative to the total number of applicants was the lowest among all ethnic groups.Data from the US Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students. Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for over 20 years. Zhu Yukong told Xinhua News Agency reporters that they hope to submit a complaint and have the US Department of Education and the Justice Department investigate, and take measures to stop these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in admissions. They also hope that the complained-against universities will take this issue seriously and change their admission policies towards Asian students.Currently, the three universities that have been complained about have not yet responded. The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015 and had previously complained about discrimination in Harvard University's admissions, but the US Department of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds. In addition to American Chinese organizations, this time's complaint also includes Indian, Korean, Japanese, and Pakistani American educational organizations."

Despite these minor issues, the information is easy to follow, making the text mostly fluent." } }

translation1: "The \"Peace Rescue-2021\" joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries' logistics concluded successfully-Xinhua Net Xinhua News Agency, Hanoi, December 12 (Zhou Na, Teng Huai Jin) On the morning of the 12th, all members of the Chinese participating team in the \"Peace Rescue-2021\" joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries' logistics returned safely to Guangxi, China, marking the successful completion of the 7-day exercise mission. This exercise focused on the major issue of humanitarian medical rescue, closely following the rescue and relief mission of the logistics department, and completing joint logistics command, joint on-site rescue, and bulk casualty treatment according to realistic combat standards. It effectively improved the logistics support capabilities of both armies.The exercise results have been recognized by both the Chinese and Vietnamese armies. The head of the Vietnamese exercise guidance committee, Vice Chairman and Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army Logistics Department, Nguyen Tuan Thanh, said at the closing ceremony of the exercise that through this exercise, the Vietnamese military medical personnel learned about the organization and professional activities of the Chinese military medical personnel, and also saw the medical and support equipment of the Chinese side. The achievements of the exercise demonstrate the professional capabilities of the medical forces of both countries in terms of medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.The head of the Chinese side's guidance and coordination group and the deputy director of the Health Bureau of the Central Military Commission's Logistics Support Department, Chen Chunming, stated that this exercise was another innovative practice built on the successful holding of the joint medical aid activity in 2018, and it has great significance as a milestone. During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective suits, and rapid nucleic acid testing instruments to the Vietnamese People's Army for epidemic prevention and control."
